attrs.name: value
attrs.desc: Dataset object, which supports static and dynamic data. ;Display Value

attrs.name: href
attrs.desc: Specify the URL of the target page.

attrs.name: max
attrs.desc: Specifies the maximum number of badges to be displayed. If the actual badge value exceeds the maximum value, the number of badges is displayed in the format of "+". Maximum value. If the value exceeds the maximum value, '{max}+' is displayed. The value must be of the Number type.

attrs.name: is-dot
attrs.desc: Sets whether there is a default new message prompt. ; Little Dots
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: hidden
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: The value of this attribute can be primary / success / warning / danger / info

attrs.name: target
attrs.desc: Specifies the redirection mode to the target page when you click the badge Dom node. This parameter is used only when the href attribute exists.
